author: markt
msg: When displaying the JSP source for the error, handle the case of included files.

author: trustin
msg: Renamed Simple* classes with no alternative implementation to Default*

author: kenney
msg: use 'UNKNOWN' for the method test name if no getName method is supplied.
Whatever value is used here doesn't seem to matter, though.

author: kenney
msg: Fix 'No test frameworks available' when junit is not specified.
Fall back to the JUnit provider anyway, since it contains POJO support.
Btw, when first compiling a project with jUnit as a dep and JUnit testcode,
then removing src/test/java, followed by 'mvn test', the tests run normally.
